review: And I thought I needed to replace my tv to have nextflix without a game attached to it.  This is super portable and really easy to use.Download the chromecast app and netflix app on your phone, plug Chromecast into your tv and connect to wifi. done.I don't do anything else with it but am completely satisfied with what it does especially for $35.  I bought an apple tv at the same time and am returning it (without using it). maybe it's better but the Chromecast works for me and is much less expensive.
